thing-type.label: ZW4001 In-Wall Dimmer
thing-type.description: In-Wall Dimmer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtIn Wall Dimmer switch module. Requires momentary switch input to change states.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtSet primary controller/gateway into inclusion mode</li&gt <li&gtPower on the in-wall dimmer, and set it into inclusion mode. </li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThere are two methods to set inclusion mode:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtRepower the dimmer, it will be set into nclusion mode automatically, and waiting to be included</li&gt <li&gtTriple press theaction button on the dimmer, it will set the dimmer into inclusion mode</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtThe connected light will stay solid on for 3 seconds to indicate successful inclusion</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<ol&gt<li&gtTriple press the action button, the dimmer will be set to inclusion/exclusion mode, then send out Node Information Frame</li&gt <li&gtWhen the dimmer is under inclusion mode.</li&gt </ol&gt<p&gtthere are 2 kinds of operation:</p&gt <ol&gt<li&gtTriple press inclusion/exclusion button, the dimmer will be set to inclusion mode again, and send out Node Information Frame</li&gt <li&gtPower off and power on the dimmer, it will be set to inclusion mode automatically, and send out Node Information Frame</li&gt </ol&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: LoadStatePowerLoss
parameter.description: Saving load state before power failure

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: EnableDisableBasicReport
parameter.description: Enable/Disable Send basic report on load change<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -- Disable to send Basic report</p&gt <p&gt1 -- Enable to sent Basic report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: DefaultFadeTime
parameter.description: Time to fade to new value (Units depend on value)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0x00 -- Instantaneous Change</p&gt <p&gt0x01 .. 0x7F -- 1 second (0x01) to 127 seconds (0x7F) in 1 second resolution</p&gt <p&gt0x80 .. 0xFE -- 1 minute (0x80) to 127 minutes (0xFE) in 1 minute resolution</p&gt <p&gt0xFF -- Factory Default duration (1 second)</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_1
parameter.label: 5: MinBrightness
parameter.description: Minimum Brightness Value<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtValid Value: 0-50, the bigger the value is, the higher the load's minimum brightness is</p&gt <p&gtNote: when configuring this value, the value of Multilevel will be configured as 1 automatically so that users can preview the corresponding effect of minimum brightness value.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: MOSFETDriveType
parameter.description: Choose MOSFET driving type<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -- trailing edge</p&gt <p&gt1 -- leading edge</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: EnableInclExcl
parameter.description: Enable Inclusion and Exclusion<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gt0 -- disable</p&gt <p&gt1 -- enable</p&gt</p&gt
